articles.content: Bangladesh's ODI skipper Tamim Iqbal said that he is getting an idea about how his team is shaping up towards next year's 50-over World Cup. Bangladesh clean-swept West Indies in the ODI series and a… [+3446 chars]

articles.title: Connor Gallagher, Mason Mount and Ben Chilwell: Chelsea key talking points from Club America friendly - Evening Standard
articles.description: Chelsea ran out 2-1 winners over Club America in a pre-season friendly in Las Vegas thanks to Mason Mount’s fine winner.
articles.content:
New signings Raheem Sterling and Kalidou Koulibaly were left out as they remain behind their new team mates for fitness following their recent arrivals.
